jsondiscoverer.zoo

Class ModelDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsondiscoverer.zoo.ModelDrawer

  • public class ModelDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class traverses a folder and generates the pictures for each model found
    Author:
    Javier Canovas (me@jlcanovas.es)

        Parameters:

        dotPath - The path to the DOT executable

    • Method Detail

      • traverseAndDrawFolder

        public void traverseAndDrawFolder(java.io.File targetFolder)
        Main method to traverse a folder, discover and generate the pictures

        This method call traverseAndDrawFolder(File, boolean) with the overwrite param active.

        Parameters:
        targetFolder - The folder to analyze

      • traverseAndDrawFolder

        public void traverseAndDrawFolder(java.io.File targetFolder,
                                  boolean overwrite)
        Main method to traverse a folder, discover and generate the pictures.

        The generation process can overwrite (or not) according to the param.

        The process traverses the folder (if contains other folders, they are traversed recursively) and generates the model/metamodel for each JSON document found.

        Parameters:
        targetFolder - The folder to analyze
        overwrite - True if the results have to overwrite

      • draw

        public void draw(java.util.List<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> elements,
                 java.io.File resultingFile)
        Draws a picture out of a list of model elements (as EObjects)
        Parameters:
        elements - List of model elements (as EObjects)
        resultingFile - The file where the picture will be saved

      • pictureFile

        private java.io.File pictureFile(java.io.File source)
        Generates a File to store the JPG out of a model file
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A File for savnig the JPG file
